item.title: Hello World
item.description: “Hello, World!” is often the first program written when learning a new programming language. It’s simple, yet powerfulâ€”it marks the beginning of a new adventure in coding. It’s a rite of passage for every programmer, a small but significant moment that confirms everything is set up correctly and working as expected.
